question: What has one head, one foot, and four legs?
What comes at the end of everything?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
What is so fragile that saying its name breaks it?
What has a bottom at the top?
I’m tall when I’m young, and I’m short when I’m old. What am I?
What has hands but can’t clap?
What kind of coat is always wet when you put it on?
What can you hold in your left hand but not in your right?
What is always in front of you but can’t be seen?
What begins with an E, ends with an E, but only contains one letter?
What can’t talk but will reply when spoken to?
I shave every day, but my beard stays the same. What am I?
What invention lets you look right through a wall?
What begins and ends with an 'e' but contains only one letter?
